department: CANADIAN FORCES SCHOOL OF COMMUNICATIONS AND ELECTRONICS
description: Procurement of office furniture, to be delivered to CFB Kingston, Kingston, ON.
full_summary:
## Tender Announcement
### Solicitation Number: W2037-24-0105/A
#### Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)
***

We are seeking a tender for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture for the Canadian Forces School of Communications and Electronics at CFB Kingston, Kingston ON. The scope of the project includes:

* Product Category 1: Interconnecting Panels and Freestanding Systems
* Product Category 3: Metal Filing and Storage Cabinets
* Product Category 6: Support Space – Collaborative Furniture

The tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is open to suppliers who have a General Stream of Suppliers (GSS) Supply Arrangement (SA) through PWGSC.

### Tender Documents

Tender documents are available on the CanadaBuys website at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/).

Please see the attached files:

* RFP_Eng.pdf
* RFP_Fr.pdf
* Amend01.pdf

### Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: 2023-11-14 at 14:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-11-14
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-03-29

### Contact Information

For questions or concerns, please contact:

Maura Archibald, Contract Specialist
Combat Training Centre, H18, Room 111
Oromocto, NB E2V 4J5
Phone: (506) 432-2731
Email: CTCFmnContracts@forces.gc.ca

You can make changes if needed.
